snippet: Mr. Carter, whose work won dozens of awards, spent nine decades in contemporary music and continued to explore new ground into his later years.
abstract: Elliott Carter, American composer whose kaleidoscopic, rigorously organized works established him as one of the most important and enduring voices in contemporary music, dies at age 103.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Carter, whose work won dozens of awards, spent nine decades in contemporary music and continued to explore new ground into his later years.

headline.seo: Elliott Carter, Composer of the Avant-Garde, Dies at 103
headline.main: Elliott Carter, Composer Who Decisively Snapped Tradition, Dies at 103
headline.print_headline: Elliott Carter, Composer Who Decisively Snapped Tradition, Dies at 103
